description: This file is a server entry point module for a Remix-based web application. It handles incoming HTTP requests, distinguishes requests from bots and browsers, and manages server-side rendering streams using React's renderToPipeableStream. It also sets CORS headers and handles OPTIONS requests.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main exported function that processes incoming requests, sets CORS headers, handles OPTIONS requests, and delegates to bot or browser-specific rendering handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering when the request is identified as from a bot; streams the rendered content.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for browser requests; streams the rendered content.
